title: Bug 109718: Put large content in text item, the tips show the content in one line
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGES DO NOT HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR THE USER TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put the mouse on the text item

Expected Result: The tips show in the given format
Actual Result: The tips show in one line
OB: When putting large content in a text item, the tips are displayed in one line instead of the expected format.
EB: The tips should be displayed in the given format, even when the content in the text item is large.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Put large content in a text item.
2. Save the changes.
3. Put the mouse on the text item to trigger the tips display.

Note: The size and specific content of the text item may affect the appearance of the tips.
